dialogue.speaker: Lady Victoria
dialogue.text: Welcome, young adventurer, to my humble abode. I've been expecting you.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: Your Lordship, the rumors of your wisdom and power have brought me to your doorstep. I seek guidance on my quest.

dialogue.speaker: Lady Victoria
dialogue.text: A brave warrior such as yourself must be cautious of the dangers that lie ahead. The shadows are treacherous, and not everyone is what they seem.
